title: Airtel Africa Fellowship To Benefit Students At IIT Madras Zanzibar
description: Airtel Africa Foundation has announced the 'Airtel Africa Fellowship Program' for the undergraduate students at the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT)-Madras Zanzibar, the first-ever foreign campus established by an IIT.
content:
IIT Madras Zanzibar is the first-ever foreign campus established by an IIT. (File)

title: Airtel Africa Foundation to offer fellowship to Zanzibar students

title: It's a marathon, both sides will benefit: Airtel Africa Foundation chief
description: Airtel Africa Foundation starts AI fellowship at IIT's first overseas campus
content: Chairman of Airtel Africa Foundation Olusegun Ogunsanya said India and Africa would now need to focus on specific areas, be it energy or technology.
